synopsis.text:
Can't get enough of drawing and the thrilling card game, Duema? Meet Joe Kirifuda, our hero who's now navigating the world of sixth grade. With his magical, talking deck case, Deckie, and his trusty sidekick Jokers, Joe's passion for Duema duels is stronger than ever. But when the demon-possessed Abaku resurfaces, Joe's world of friendly competition takes a dark turn. What sinister motives drive Abaku? Brace yourself as Joe's journey reaches its thrilling peak!

In this new phase of "Duel Masters King," prepare for a twist of time travel, adding an extra layer of excitement to Joe's adventures. As Joe faces off against the formidable Abaku, he finds himself in a desperate battle to reclaim his beloved Deckie. Will Joe rise to the challenge, overcome Abaku, and continue his winning streak in the world of Duel Masters? Join Joe as he embarks on this thrilling journey, where the stakes have never been higher!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
